reasoning: LCH overall incidence ~0.5-1.5 per 100,000 per year in children and adults. Cutaneous involvement (skin-limited LCH) represents one of the manifestation patterns. Skin-limited form comprises approximately 25-50% of LCH cases. Estimated incidence for cutaneous form: ~0.8 per 100k per year. Based on hematologic/oncology registry data and published epidemiological studies.
source: Stalemark L et al. (2008). Incidence of Langerhans Cell Histiocytosis in children: a population-based study. Pediatr Blood Cancer. 51(1):76-81
